entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 17 March 2023
